title: What is AI?
image_desc: A futuristic cityscape with robots and drones interacting with humans.
narration: Welcome to the world of artificial intelligence, or AI for short. AI is transforming our lives in countless ways, from the apps we use to the cars we drive. But what exactly is it?

title: AI Explained
content:
AI is the ability of a computer or machine to mimic human intelligence.
This includes tasks like learning, problem-solving, and decision-making.
AI systems are trained on massive datasets, allowing them to learn and improve over time.
image_desc: A computer screen displaying complex algorithms and data visualizations.
narration: AI is essentially the ability of a computer or machine to think and act like a human. This includes tasks like learning, problem-solving, and making decisions. AI systems are trained on massive amounts of data, which allows them to learn and improve over time. Imagine a computer that can learn from its mistakes and get better at a task with each attempt. That's the power of AI.
